reviewPage.selectItemEmpty: Select an item to review and analyze
reviewPage.selectMediaEmpty: Select a media item to view analyses
reviewPage.autoReviewLabel: Automatically generate a review when you select an item
reviewPage.mediaModeHint: Search and inspect one media item at a time. Select a result to view its content and analyses on the right.
reviewPage.resultsHelp: Keyboard: Tab into the results list, use Enter or Space to select the focused row, then use the Prev/Next buttons in the analysis toolbar to move between items.
reviewPage.reviewHint: Ask the assistant to review this item.
reviewPage.attachGeneratedHint: Run the assistant and attach the result to this media item.
reviewPage.saveGeneratedNoteHint: Run the assistant and save the result as a note.
reviewPage.saveToMediaHint: Attach the current text in the editor to this media item.
reviewPage.saveAnalysisHint: Create a note from the current analysis.
reviewPage.resultsHint: Click a result to load its content and analyses on the right.
reviewPage.paginationHint: Use filters or pagination to refine the results if many items are loaded.
reviewPage.offlineHint: Connect to your tldw server in Settings to send messages and view media. Then you can search media from this page.
reviewPage.chatWithMediaHint: Open Chat and prefill the composer with this media’s content.
reviewPage.chatPrepared: Prepared chat with this media in the composer.
reviewPage.chatAboutMediaHint: Open RAG chat scoped to this media only.
reviewPage.chatAboutMediaInvalidId: 此媒体项尚未有数字 ID。

mediaPage.selectItemsHint: Select items on the left to view here.
mediaPage.filterHelp: Search matches title and content; Types and Keywords further narrow the results.
mediaPage.keywordHelper: 关键字可以帮助你使用左侧的关键字筛选器找到此媒体
mediaPage.modeHint: 搜索并堆叠多个媒体项，在右侧查看器中进行比较。
mediaPage.viewerHelp: 键盘：按 Tab 进入结果列表，使用 Enter 或空格键将媒体项加入/移出堆栈，然后使用上一条/下一条和布局控件在查看器中的各项之间移动。
mediaPage.viewerHelpLabel: 多项审阅的键盘快捷键
mediaPage.noSelectionDescription: 在左侧侧边栏选择一个媒体项，在此查看其内容和分析。
mediaPage.createNoteWithContentAnalysis: 使用内容 + 分析创建笔记

empty.connectDescription: Connect to your tldw server in Settings to send messages and view media. After connecting, you can review media and notes here.
empty.connectExample1: Open Settings → tldw server to add your server URL.
empty.connectExample2: Once connected, browse media and notes, then generate structured reviews and summaries.
empty.demoDescription: This demo shows how tldw Assistant can turn media and notes into structured reviews. Connect your own server later to analyze your own content.
empty.demoExample1: See how selected media and notes appear in the review workspace.
empty.demoExample2: When you connect, you’ll be able to generate summaries and action items from your own recordings and notes.

mediaEmpty.demoDescription: This demo shows how tldw Assistant can display and inspect processed media. Connect your own server later to browse your own recordings and documents.
mediaEmpty.demoExample1: See how processed media items appear in the Media viewer.
mediaEmpty.demoExample2: When you connect, you’ll be able to browse and inspect media ingested from your own recordings and files.
mediaEmpty.connectDescription: Connect to your tldw server in Settings to send messages and view media. After connecting, processed recordings and documents will be listed here.
mediaEmpty.connectExample1: Open Settings → tldw server to add your server URL.
mediaEmpty.connectExample2: Once connected, use Quick ingest in the header to add media from your own recordings and files.
mediaEmpty.offlineTitle: Media API not available on this server
mediaEmpty.offlineDescription: This tldw server does not advertise the Media endpoints (for example, /api/v1/media and /api/v1/media/search). Upgrade your server to a version that includes Media to use this workspace.
mediaEmpty.offlineExample1: Open Diagnostics to confirm your server version and available APIs.
mediaEmpty.offlineExample2: 升级后，请重新加载扩展程序并返回“媒体”。
